compatibility.notes: This license allows for permissive use and distribution, but care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Retain original copyright notices in derived works.
Include the NRL license text in redistributions.
license.name: NRL
obligations: Follow all terms of the UC Berkeley copyright and license.
Retain copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in documentation for binary redistributions.
Display acknowledgements in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name of NRL or its contributors for endorsement or promotion.
